input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='4' South Carolina Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 250 Clear Lights and 752 Bendable Branches'
  - Name='6 ft. Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Hinged Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Partially Flocked Pencil Christmas Tree w/ 2-in-1 Multicolor Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Holliston Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 6.5-foot Pre-Lit Slim Portland Artificial Fir Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 7.5ft Pre-Lit Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 4ft. Pre-Lit Rose Gold Artificial Tree-in Burlap Sac'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 5 ft. Sierra Spruce Natural Look Artificial Christmas Tree with 200 Clear LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Company 3 ft. Snowy Downswept Forestree Artificial Christmas Tree with Metal Plate and Clear Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 4' South Carolina Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 250 Clear Lights and 752 Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a real tree silhouette (Fir) with clear lights and many bendable branches, similar functionally to the reference, but is smaller and less detailed regarding branch realism and hinge mechanism.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6 ft. Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Hinged Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 6 ft pre-lit Fir tree with hinged branches aligns closely with reference's height, pre-lit feature, and hinged branches but differs by snow flocking which affects appearance but not structure.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Partially Flocked Pencil Christmas Tree w/ 2-in-1 Multicolor Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial tree but pencil shape differs significantly from downswept full shape of reference; partial flocking and multicolor lights reduce relevancy.
Same brand but product name does not specify downswept or Douglas Fir shape or pre-lit features; likely less directly comparable without further details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 6.5-foot Pre-Lit Slim Portland Artificial Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same height, pre-lit Fir tree but slim shape contrasts with full downswept shape of reference, lowering relevancy somewhat.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 7.5ft Pre-Lit Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A taller pre-lit Fir tree similar in style and construction, Fraser Fir is close to Douglas Fir; slightly bigger size may reduce direct comparison.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 4ft. Pre-Lit Rose Gold Artificial Tree-in Burlap Sac
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Only 4 ft height, colored rose gold lights, and decorative burlap sac indicate less similarity in core features to the downswept, natural green tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 5 ft. Sierra Spruce Natural Look Artificial Christmas Tree with 200 Clear LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 5 ft artificial spruce with clear lights and natural look shares some attributes but smaller size, different species (Spruce vs Fir), and fewer lights reduce relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 3 ft. Snowy Downswept Forestree Artificial Christmas Tree with Metal Plate and Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, downswept shape, and clear lights match the reference product type but smaller at 3 ft and snowy finish lower relevance to full 6.5 ft natural green model.
